This study test feasibility efficacy trial REBOOT v treatment usual ( information referral ) evaluate overdose event ( non-fatal death ) , drug use cessation , overdose HIV risk behavior , among opioid-dependent person previously overdose already receive take-home naloxone ( opioid antagonist use reverse overdose ) .
